snippet: Sterling Bank <STERLNB.LG> will abandon plans to buy a rival because of the high costs of doing an acquisition and focus instead on organic growth driven by retail customers, its chief financial officer said....

headline.main: Dying Author Pens Essay With Dating Profile of Husband
headline.print_headline: Dying Author Pens Essay With Dating Profile of Husband

lead_paragraph: Sterling Bank <STERLNB.LG> will abandon plans to buy a rival because of the high costs of doing an acquisition and focus instead on organic growth driven by retail customers, its chief financial officer said.
